feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: Community Spotlight: WorldFlight
entry.summary: An Introduction to WorldflightSince 1999 a group of flight simulator enthusiasts have been gathering together online during the first full week of November to raise money for multiple worldwide charities. In 23 years well over $1,000,000 has been raised for the charities handpicked by each team for causes that hold a special meaning. The event … Continued

entry.title: In Memory of Anton Logvynenko: Digital Artist & Aviation Enthusiast
entry.summary: The team at Microsoft Flight Simulator would like to take a moment to pay our condolences and provide tribute to a beloved member of the flight sim community – Anton Logvynenko, who passed away while carrying out a combat mission in the Kharkiv region on November 27, 2023.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator at FlightSimExpo 2024
entry.summary: FlightSimExpo 2024 — North America’s largest gathering of flight simulation enthusiasts — is taking place at the Rio Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada from June 21-23, and the Microsoft Flight Simulator team will be there!We’re so excited to meet simmers from all around the world in-person at the Expo, but we also know … Continued

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Releases Local Legend 17: The Curtiss C-46 Commando
entry.summary: Simmers can now pilot this renowned World-War II-era legend!

entry.title: July 4th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: To simmers in the United States, we’d like to wish you a happy Independence Day! Many of our team members are enjoying the holiday themselves today, so this Development Update will be abbreviated compared to most other weeks. In particular, there are no new or updated Marketplace products releasing today, but a few products did release earlier this week on Monday and Tuesday. Please see the Marketplace section below for more details!

entry.title: July 11th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: We originally planned to host our July Developer Livestream earlier this week, but unfortunately due to a scheduling issue we had to move it to next week instead. The revised date is Wednesday, July 17 at 10:30am PDT (1730 UTC).

entry.title: Summer Sale: 2550+ Items On Sale Now in the Marketplace
entry.summary: For 15 Days starting on July 17th, save up to 85% on more than 2550 items. To purchase these discounted items, visit the Microsoft Flight Simulator Marketplace, select ‘Featured’, scroll down to ‘Special Offers’, then select ‘See All’ and look for the savings.

entry.title: July 18th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: Earlier this week, we hosted our July Developer Livestream on Twitch. If you missed watching it live, you can view the VOD on YouTube below. In addition to answering many questions from the community, our panel also discussed Sim Update 16, the upcoming Boeing 707, and revealed the location of World Update XVII: UK & Ireland!
